content:
[Ohio Senate 2024 | Columbus Metro (Franklin County - Upper Arlington/Dublin) | P6: M, 46, Financial advisor, Westerville, Trump 2020, moderate Republican]
Q: What would it take for Democrats to be competitive statewide?
"Actually show up in small towns. Not just for photo ops."
participant_profile: M, 46, Financial advisor, Westerville, Trump 2020, moderate Republican

content_original: Actually show up in small towns. Not just for photo ops.
